extendedInfo.description: An integrated multiple calendars and contacts solution for Android, PCs, the web, other smartphones. Import your multiple Outlook calendars and Google Calendars and sync them automatically on your phone. (Google and Outlook Contacts syncing coming soon!) Share calendars and contact lists with anyone. Create groups with which you share calendar events and contacts, and updates sync automatically throughout the group.  Sync Clear with ClearSync.ClearSync to Outlook: This newly released product is a free trial product--you must purchase an annual license for $9.95 after the two-week free trial. This is THE low cost way to get your Outlook calendars synced with your phone, with all of ClearSync's attractive UI. Runs in Windows only and requires a second download to your desktop or laptop, where you run Outlook. Annual license available for purchase if you like the app, from within the app.Additional features:- Day, week, month, agenda views in calendars- Touch an event to edit; touch a day to navigate- Alphabetical views or category views in contacts- Sync to multiple Google Calendars and accounts- Set up one or multiple groups and share different calendars to different groups: work teams, families, sports teams, classes or religious groups. You decide which calendars you share with whom, and the color coding helps you keep track of different types of events. See your kids' activity and academic events on your phone.- Put events on multiple calendars, not copies of those events. Updates are reflected on every calendar.- Integrated operation: from a contact screen create a phone appointment with clickable phone number right in your event, or an appointment with a one-click mappable address right in the appointment.- Select the themed color scheme and text size that is right for you.- Publish a web widget for calendar events to keep your group's web site up to date automatically.- Assign read and write permissions to the calendars and contact lists you share, or keep the details of your activities private.For more details, go to: www.clearsync.comAnd if you have any problems, suggestions or questions please email us at:  support@clearsync.zendesk.com

reviews.title: Syncs with Outlook.
reviews.comment: Set it up and it just works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not really free..because u cant sync to outlook...
reviews.comment: unless you pay for the actual app.  Well.. since I wanted to see how it would sync my google calendar and outlook calendar together and if it was worth paying for, this is of no help because it wont do this on a trial basis.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very usefull product for calendars
reviews.comment: Outlook has presented problems on every platform i\'ve owrked with. You always have to put together non-perfect solutions to make it work. ClearSync has created one of the best calendar syncing solutions I have used. While it is not perfect. It is a really solid first version. I am VERY much looking forward to the outlook contact sync product. I think the company could do a little more work on the user interface and flow of the product. I hignly recomend it to anyone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Works great on my desire hd with Windows8 and Outlook2010.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Outlook on my phone at last!
reviews.comment: And there\'s even a Google calendar link too - pretty slick. Contacts links apparently coming soon too ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why do I have to create an account to sync locally
reviews.comment: I am looking for a way of syncing my details locally, as this app insists on an account before it can be used, it\'s not for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful to connect my Outlook calendars
